title: Building Production RAG Systems

description: ReAct, chain-of-thought, and other patterns for building agentic systems.

description: Common pitfalls and how to fix them when working with embeddings.

title: AI Tool Use APIs
description: Building robust tool calling systems with GPT-4 and Claude.
